Posts.Content: Jun 21, 2014 05:27PM Bikedog wrote: I had complete tumor response before my surgery. But my oncologist still insisted on radiation to the point of rushing me through my expansion because I shouldn't wait to start radiation. My initial tests staged me at 111c grade 3 with the node beneath my breastbone positive. I would rather have the doctors treat too aggressively then not enough.
Posts.Title: Anyone else is a radiation "gray area"? katiegrey TB90
